Package JEST.model.cards

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
JEST.model.cards.Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Deck extends Object implements Serializable
This class defines the decks : we can shuffle it, fill it...

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Deck getInstance(DeckType type)
      Permit to have 2 instances maximum : the general and the restOfCards.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the deck (general or restOfCards).
      Returns:
      the deck created.

    • fill

      public void fill()
      Fill the general deck with all the Cards of the game. We precise the type of the card (suit or joker), his suit, his value, and the Trophy associated to the card.

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Shuffle the deck.

    • deal

      public Card deal()
      Deal a card and return it.
      Returns:
      the card dealt.

    • deal

      public List<Card> deal(int numCards)
      Deal the number of cards asked.
      Parameters:
      numCards - the number of cards who have to be dealt.
      Returns:
      the list of the cards dealt.

    • add

      public void add(Card card)
      Add a card to the deck.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to add.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Check if the deck is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the deck is empty, false otherwise.
